text: aur sab allaah ke saamane khulakar[1] aa jaayenge, to nirbal log unase kahenge, jo bade ban rahe the ki ham tumhaare anuyaayee the, to kya tum allaah kee yaatana se bachaane ke lie hamaare kuchh kaam aa sakoge? ve kahengeh yadi allaah ne hamen maargadarshan diya hota, to ham avashy tumhen maargadarshan dikha dete. ab to samaan hai, chaahe ham adheer hon ya dhairy se kaam len, hamaare bachane ka koee upaay nahin hai
